name: Blue (Dan - Showstopping Games)
description:
Blue is the result of my first game jam project. Our task was to create a game based on opposites, so my team and I came up with a game that works with opposite colours and opposite maps. Touching the coloured orbs swaps to the opposite version of the map. The aim of the game is to escape each room using both of the maps to solve puzzles.
